title: Event-based vision for egomotion estimation using precise event timing
details: H Greatorex, M Mastella, M Cotteret, O Richter… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Egomotion estimation is crucial for applications such as autonomous navigation and robotics, where accurate and real-time motion tracking is required. However, traditional methods relying on inertial sensors are highly sensitive to external …
